## sleep() function

异步等候

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function sleep<V = any>(time: number, emitValue?: any, isError?: boolean): Promise<V>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  time | <code>number</code> | 等候时间 |
|  emitValue | <code>any</code> | 默认不需要 |
|  isError | <code>boolean</code> | 是否以reject |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Promise<V>`

返回Promise<emitValue>
